markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Beneath Notice](/Feats.aspx?ID=2735) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Golden League Xun](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=93)

**Prerequisites**
[Golden League Xun Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2734); Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You are skilled at hiding from your foes and targets among the common populace. You gain the [Quick Disguise](/Feats.aspx?ID=823) and [Slippery Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=842) skill feats. In addition, while in a crowd, you can [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) a nondescript member of the crowd as a three action activity (one action if you are legendary in Deception).
name: Beneath Notice
prerequisite: Golden League Xun Dedication; Expert in Deception
